		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="section-head style-1">
<h2 class="title m-b20">About Familyraksha</h2>
Welcome to FamilyRaksha.com, your one-stop destination for all your insurance needs. We are a leading insurance web aggregator, specializing in providing comprehensive and tailor-made insurance solutions to protect you and your family's future. Our commitment to excellence, transparency, and customer-centric approach sets us apart as a trusted name in the insurance industry. In this article, we will introduce you to the world of FamilyRaksha.com and its offerings, showcasing why we are the best choice for term insurance, health insurance, and investment plans.

</div>
<ul class="list-check primary m-b0">
 	<li>Provides Financial Security</li>
 	<li>Affordable Option</li>
 	<li>Customizable Policies</li>
 	<li>Tax Benefits</li>
 	<li>Peace of Mind</li>
 	<li>Protection for Your Business</li>
 	<li>Coverage Against Critical Illnesses.</li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Privacy Policy]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/privacy-policy/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 22 Jul 2024 11:51:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://localhost:8888/wordpress/familyraksha/?page_id=87</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Privacy Policy for Family Raksha</h4>
<p>DYS Family Raksha Insurance web aggregators Private Ltd. operates the website at https://www.familyraksha.com (“Site”). We respect the privacy of each user of the Site (referred to as “you” or “a user”), whether it’s your first time, or if you’ve visited our Site previously. This Privacy Statement gives you specific information about how we protect your privacy, how we treat information we collect on the Site that identifies an individual user (“Personal Information”), and how we use aggregated information.</p>
<p>By registering for or using the site, you signify your acceptance of this privacy statement. If you do not agree to this privacy statement, you cannot use the site. We reserve the right to modify this Statement at any time by posting a notice on the Site’s home page. (If we consider it appropriate, we may also provide additional notice of significant changes.) Your use of the Site after the date of the last modification listed at the beginning of this Privacy Statement indicates to us that you agree to the changes.</p>
</div>
<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Information Collection and Use</h4>
<p>For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to First Name, Last Name, Email. The information that we request will be retained by us and used as described in this privacy policy.</p>
<p>When you use the Website, Apps, Newsletters and interact with our Services, we may use technology such as that provided by Google Analytics, etc to collect information about your visit to our website and/or Newsletters. In essence, these tools enable us to analyse how you and others interact with our Website, Apps and Newsletters.</p>
</div>
<div class="row">
   <div class="col-lg-12 m-b30">
	<h4 class="dlab-title">The information we collect may include</h4>
	<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
	<li>the type of browser you use to access our website/newsletter;</li>
   <li>the number of sessions per day;</li>
   <li>the type of device (e.g. iPhone) and operating system (e.g. iOS) you are using;</li>
   <li>if you opened our newsletters;</li>
   <li>user preferences;</li>
   <li>which pages you visited.</li>
	</ul>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row">
   <div class="col-lg-12 m-b30">
   <h3>This is what we do with the information we collect about you</h3>
   <h4 class="dlab-title">We use the information you provide to us to:
   </h4>
   <ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
      <li>enable us to provide the Services.</li>
      <li>ensure that content from our Website, Apps and Newsletters is presented in the most effective manner for you and for your device to achieve the most user-friendly navigation experience.</li>
      <li>provide you with marketing information about us and our services.</li>
      <li>notify you about changes to the Website, Apps and Newsletters and the Services.</li>
      <li>carry out our obligations arising out of the Terms of Use; and/or</li>
      <li>defend our servers against malicious attacks.</li>
   </ul>
   </div>
</div>

<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Cookies</h4>
<p>Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.</p>
<p>This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.</p>
</div>

<div class="row">
   <div class="col-lg-12 m-b30">
   <h4 class="dlab-title">Service Providers</h4>
   <p>We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:</p>
   <ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
      <li>To facilitate our Service.</li>
      <li>To provide the Service on our behalf.</li>
      <li>To perform Service-related services; or</li>
      <li>To assist us in analysing how our Service is used.</li>
   </ul>
   <p>We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.</p>
   <p>Links to privacy policy of third-party service providers used by the app and why we use them.</p>
   <p>1.Google Analytics- To monitor our website performance and user experience.</p>
   </div>
</div>
<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Security</h4>
<p>We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.</p>
</div>
<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Links to Other Sites</h4>
<p>This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.</p>
</div>
<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Changes to This Privacy Policy</h4>
<p>We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.</p>
</div>
<div class="m-b40">
<h4 class="dlab-title">Contact Us</h4>
<p>If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at contact@familyraksha.com</p>
</div>
]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh: Secure Your Future with Family Raksha]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/term-life-insurance/term-insurance-in-andhra-pradesh-secure-your-future-with-family-raksha/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 03 Aug 2024 09:36:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://dev.familyraksha.com/?page_id=549</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Protect your family's future with best term insurance in Andhra Pradesh. In this fast paced life we are more uncertain about the future and what it may cost to your family. That is the reason term insurance has become more popular to secure your financial stability. </p>

<p>Term insurance is a type of life insurance that provides coverage for a specific period. In Andhra Pradesh, term insurance is a popular choice for people who want to ensure their family's financial security. Family Raksha, a leading insurance web aggregator, offers a variety of term insurance plans to suit different needs.</p>

<p>Term insurance makes you able to secure your family future with a certain sum of premium. You pay a premium for a specific term, and if something happens to you during this period, your family gets a payout. This payout can help them cover expenses, pay off debts, and maintain their standard of living. With Family Raksha, you can compare different term insurance plans in Andhra Pradesh and choose the one that best fits your requirements.</p>
<h3>Why Choose Family Raksha for Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh?</h3>
<p>Family Raksha is your trusted partner for term insurance in Andhra Pradesh, offering comprehensive coverage and unmatched customer service. With a range of flexible plans customized to fit your needs, we ensure peace of mind and financial security for your loved ones. Our easy online application process and dedicated support team make securing your policy straightforward and hassle-free. Choose Family Raksha for reliable and affordable term insurance, backed by our commitment to protecting what matters most to you. Get started today and secure your family's future with confidence!</p>
<h3>Benefits of choosing Family Raksha for Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh</h3>
<p>There are many benefits of choosing family raksha for term insurance in Andhra Pradesh. Some of these benefits include:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Affordable Premiums: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Term insurance plans from Family Raksha come with affordable premiums, making it easy for everyone to get insured. This affordability ensures that you can provide financial security for your family without straining your budget.</span></li>
 	<li><b>High Coverage:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> You can get high coverage amounts that ensure your family is financially secure. The payout from a term insurance plan can help your family maintain their lifestyle, pay off debts, and cover educational expenses.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Tax Benefits: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Premiums paid for term insurance are eligible for tax deductions under Section 80C of the Income Tax Act. This means you can save on taxes while securing your family's future.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Flexibility:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Term insurance plans in Andhra Pradesh offer flexibility in choosing the policy term and coverage amount. This allows you to tailor the plan to your specific needs and financial goals.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Peace of Mind: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Knowing that your family will be financially protected if something happens to you provides peace of mind. You can focus on living your life to the fullest without worrying about the future.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>How to Choose the Best Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh</h3>
<p>Choosing the best term insurance in Andhra Pradesh involves considering several factors:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Coverage Amount: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Decide on the amount of coverage you need to secure your family's future. The coverage should be sufficient to cover expenses, debts, and other financial obligations.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Policy Term:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Choose a policy term that matches your financial goals. The term should be long enough to cover the years when your family is most financially dependent on you.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Claim Settlement Ratio: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Check the claim settlement ratio of the insurance company to ensure they are reliable. A high claim settlement ratio indicates that the company is likely to honor claims promptly and without hassle.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Additional Benefits:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Look for additional benefits such as riders that can enhance your coverage. Riders like accidental death benefit, critical illness cover, and waiver of premium can provide extra protection.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Premium Payment Options:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Consider the premium payment options available. Some plans offer flexible payment options like monthly, quarterly, or annual payments.</span></li>
</ul>

<p>We at Family Raksha, help you compare different plans to find the best term insurance in Andhra Pradesh. By using their platform, you can easily compare premiums, coverage amounts, and benefits to make an informed decision.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Types of Term Insurance Plans in Andhra Pradesh offered by Family Raksha</span></h3>
<p>There are different types of term insurance plans available in Andhra Pradesh. Some of the popular plan offered by Family Raksha  include:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Level Term Plan: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">The coverage amount remains the same throughout the policy term. This type of plan is straightforward and easy to understand, making it a popular choice.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Increasing Term Plan: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">The coverage amount increases over time to keep up with inflation. This type of plan ensures that your family's financial protection increases with rising costs.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Decreasing Term Plan: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">The coverage amount decreases over time, usually aligned with a decreasing loan amount. This type of plan is ideal for those who want to cover a specific financial obligation like a mortgage.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Return of Premium Plan:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> In this plan, if the policyholder survives the policy term, the premiums paid are returned. This type of plan provides a savings component along with insurance coverage.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Convertible Term Plan:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> This plan allows the policyholder to convert the term plan into a permanent life insurance plan at a later date. This provides flexibility for those who may want lifelong coverage in the future.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>We at Family Raksha, offer these plans to cater to different needs. By understanding the different types of term insurance plans, you can choose the one that best fits your requirements.</p>
<h3>How to Apply for Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh</span></h2>
<span style="font-weight: 400;">Applying for term insurance in Andhra Pradesh with Family Raksha is simple and convenient process:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Visit the Website: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Go to our website and fill in your details to get a quote. </span></li>
 	<li><b>Compare Plans:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Use the comparison tool to compare different term insurance plans. This tool allows you to see the features, benefits, and premiums of various plans side by side.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Choose a Plan:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Select the plan that best suits your needs and budget. Consider factors like coverage amount, policy term, and additional benefits.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Complete the Application:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Fill out the application form and submit the required documents. The application process is designed to be quick and hassle-free.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Medical Examination:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Depending on the coverage amount and your age, you may need to undergo a medical examination. Our experts will guide you through this process.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Policy Issuance:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Once your application is approved, the policy will be issued. You will receive the policy document containing all the details of your coverage.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Term Insurance Riders in Andhra Pradesh</span></h3>
<p>Riders are additional benefits that you can add to your term insurance plan for extra protection. Some common riders available in Andhra Pradesh include:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Accidental Death Benefit Rider:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Provides an additional payout in case of death due to an accident. This rider ensures that your family receives extra financial support in case of an accidental death.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Critical Illness Rider: </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">Offers a lump sum payout if diagnosed with a critical illness. This rider helps cover medical expenses and other costs associated with a serious illness.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Waiver of Premium Rider:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Waives off future premiums if the policyholder becomes disabled. This rider ensures that your policy remains in force even if you are unable to pay the premiums due to disability.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Income Benefit Rider:</b><span style="font-weight: 400;"> Provides a regular income to your family for a specific period in case of your death. This rider helps your family manage their monthly expenses.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Terminal Illness Rider</b><span style="font-weight: 400;">: Offers a payout if the policyholder is diagnosed with a terminal illness. This rider provides financial support during a challenging time.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>We at Family Raksha, offer these riders to enhance your term insurance coverage. By adding riders to your policy, you can tailor your coverage to meet your specific needs.</p>
<h3>Why You Need Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh</h3>
<p>Term insurance in Andhra Pradesh is important because it provides financial security to your family in your absence. With the rising cost of living and unexpected events, having a term insurance plan ensures that your family is protected.</p>

<p>Term insurance also helps in financial planning. By securing a term insurance plan, you can ensure that your family's financial goals are met even if you are not there. It may include paying for education, covering daily expenses, and paying off debts.</p>

<p>Additionally, term insurance offers peace of mind. Knowing that your family will be taken care of allows you to live your life without constant worry about the future. We are committed to helping you find the best term insurance plan that fits your needs and budget.</p>
<h3>Get Term Insurance in Andhra Pradesh with Family Raksha</span></h3>
<p>Securing your family's future is crucial. With Family Raksha, you can find the best term insurance in Andhra Pradesh that suits your needs. Don't wait until it's too late. Protect your loved ones today by choosing a term insurance plan from Family Raksha.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>FAQs</h2>
<h5>What is the eligibility for term insurance in Andhra Pradesh?</h5>
<p>Most term insurance plans require you to be between 18 and 65 years old. The exact age range may vary depending on the insurer.</p>
<h5>Can I buy term insurance in Andhra Pradesh online?</h5>
<p>Yes, with Family Raksha, you can easily buy term insurance online. The online process is quick, convenient, and allows you to compare multiple plans.</p>
<h5>What happens if I miss a premium payment?</h5>
<p>Most insurance companies offer a grace period to make the payment. If you miss the grace period, the policy may lapse. It is important to pay your premiums on time to keep your policy active.</p>
<h5>Can I change the coverage amount later?</h5>
<p>Some plans allow you to increase or decrease the coverage amount during the policy term. Check with your insurer for the specific terms and conditions.</p>
<h5>Are there any medical tests required for term insurance?</h5>
<p>It depends on the insurance plan and the coverage amount. Some plans may require a medical test, especially for higher coverage amounts.</p>
<h5>What is the claim process for term insurance in Andhra Pradesh?</h5>
<p>The nominee needs to submit a claim form along with necessary documents to the insurance company. The insurance company will then process the claim and release the payout.</p>
<h5>How can I check the status of my application?</h5>
<p>You can check the status of your application by logging into the Family Raksha website or contacting their customer service.</p>]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Financial Security, Tax Benefits, Affordable Premium and many more with term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh. Term insurance is a type of life insurance that provides coverage for a specific period. In Arunachal Pradesh, term insurance is a popular choice for people who want to ensure their family's financial security. Family Raksha, a leading insurance web aggregator, offers a variety of term insurance plans to suit different needs. We help you compare different term insurance plans in Arunachal Pradesh and choose the one that best fits your needs.</p>
<h3>Why Choose Family Raksha for Term Insurance in Arunachal Pradesh?</span></h3>
<p>Choosing term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh is a wise decision because it offers high coverage at an affordable cost. With Family Raksha, you can find the best term insurance plans that provide financial protection to your family in case of an unfortunate event.</p>

<h3>How to Choose the Best Term Insurance in Arunachal Pradesh</h2>
<p>Choosing the best term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh involves considering several factors:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Coverage Amount: </b><span>Decide on the amount of coverage you need to secure your family's future. The coverage should be sufficient to cover expenses, debts, and other financial obligations.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Policy Term: </b><span>Choose a policy term that matches your financial goals. The term should be long enough to cover the years when your family is most financially dependent on you.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Claim Settlement Ratio:</b><span> Check the claim settlement ratio of the insurance company to ensure they are reliable. A high claim settlement ratio indicates that the company is likely to honor claims promptly and without hassle.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Additional Benefits:</b><span> Look for additional benefits such as riders that can enhance your coverage. Riders like accidental death benefit, critical illness cover, and waiver of premium can provide extra protection.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Premium Payment Options:</b><span> Consider the premium payment options available. Some plans offer flexible payment options like monthly, quarterly, or annual payments.</span></li>
</ul>

<p>We at Family Raksha help you compare different plans to find the best term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh. By using our platform, you can easily compare premiums, coverage amounts, and benefits to make an informed decision.</p>

<h3>Types of Term Insurance Plans in Arunachal Pradesh</h3>
<p>There are different types of term insurance plans available in Arunachal Pradesh. Some of the popular ones include:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Level Term Plan: </b><span>The coverage amount remains the same throughout the policy term. This type of plan is straightforward and easy to understand, making it a popular choice.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Increasing Term Plan:</b><span> The coverage amount increases over time to keep up with inflation. It ensures that your family's financial protection increases with rising costs.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Decreasing Term Plan: </b><span>The coverage amount decreases over time, usually aligned with a decreasing loan amount. It is ideal for those who want to cover a specific financial obligation like a mortgage.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Return of Premium Plan:</b><span> In this plan, if the policyholder survives the policy term, the premiums paid are returned. This type of plan provides a savings component along with insurance coverage.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Convertible Term Plan:</b><span> It allows you to convert the term plan into a permanent life insurance plan at a later date. This provides flexibility for those who may want lifelong coverage in the future.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>Family Raksha offers these plans to cater to different needs. By understanding the different types of term insurance plans, you can choose the one that best fits your requirements.</p>
<h3>Apply online for Term Insurance in Arunachal Pradesh</h3>
<p>Planning to buy term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh? Follow these simple steps to complete the process:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Step 1: </b><span>Provide your details and requirements to get personalized quotes for term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Step 2: </b><span>Compare different term insurance with the features, benefits, and premium plan.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Step 3: </b><span>Select the plan that best suits your needs and budget. Consider factors like coverage amount, policy term, and additional benefits.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Step 4: </b><span>Fill out the application form and submit the required documents. The application process is designed to be quick and hassle-free</span></li>
 	<li><b>Step 5: </b><span>Depending on the coverage amount and your age, you may need to undergo a medical examination. Our expert at Family Raksha will guide you through this process.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Step 6: </b><span>Once your application is approved, the policy will be issued. You will receive the policy document containing all the details of your coverage.</span></li>
</ul>
<h3>Term Insurance Riders in Arunachal Pradesh</span></h3>
<p>Riders are additional benefits that you can add to your term insurance plan for extra protection. Some common riders available in Arunachal Pradesh include:</p>
<ul class="list-check style-1 primary">
 	<li><b>Accidental Death Benefit Rider</b><span>: Provides an additional payout in case of death due to an accident. This rider ensures that your family receives extra financial support in case of an accidental death.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Critical Illness Rider:</b><span> Offers a lump sum payout if diagnosed with a critical illness. This rider helps cover medical expenses and other costs associated with a serious illness.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Waiver of Premium Rider:</b><span> Waives off future premiums if the policyholder becomes disabled. This rider ensures that your policy remains in force even if you are unable to pay the premiums due to disability.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Income Benefit Rider:</b><span> Provides a regular income to your family for a specific period in case of your death. This rider helps your family manage their monthly expenses.</span></li>
 	<li><b>Terminal Illness Rider: </b><span>Offers a payout if the policyholder is diagnosed with a terminal illness. This rider provides financial support during a challenging time.</span></li>
</ul>
<p>We at Family Raksha, offer these riders to enhance your term insurance coverage. By adding riders to your policy, you can customize your coverage to meet your specific needs.</p>
<h3>Why You Need Term Insurance in Arunachal Pradesh</h3>
<p>Term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh is important because it provides financial security to your family in your absence. With the rising cost of living and unexpected events, having a  term insurance plan ensures that your family is protected.</p>

<p>Term insurance also helps in financial planning. By securing a term insurance plan, you can ensure that your family's financial goals are met even if you are not there. This includes paying for education, covering daily expenses, and paying off debts.</p>

<p>Additionally, term insurance offers peace of mind. Knowing that your family will be taken care of allows you to live your life without constant worry about the future. We are committed to helping you find the best term insurance plan that fits your needs and budget.</p>
<h3>Get Term Insurance in Arunachal Pradesh with Family Raksha</h3>
<p>Securing your family's future is important. With Family Raksha, you can find the best term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh that suits your needs. Don't wait until it's too late. Protect your loved ones today by choosing a term insurance plan from Family Raksha.</p>

<p>Get a quote now for the best term insurance in Arunachal Pradesh. Secure your family's future today!</p>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Sum Assured Term Insurance]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/sum-assured-term-insurance/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Aug 2024 09:54:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[digital]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blog.familyraksha.com/?p=356</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Term Insurance is an amazing, trusted way to extensively safeguard your loved ones against any uncertain life events. Doing proper financial planning is quite important for getting your family in a safer zone. Term Insurance has been widely preferred by many numbers of people for its beneficial. Availing of the premiums helps to pay for these plans, which are exempt under Section 80C of the Income Tax Act of 1961. It is essential to know what is sum assured in term insurance for buying the premiums
<h1>What Is Sum Assured?</h1>
Normally, the Sum assured in the Term Insurance is a pre-defined sum that the insurance company agrees as the payment for you or the nominee. This pre-defined sum will be paid if the policyholder underwent any event. The sum assured in insurance will be completely determined during the time of policy purchase. Sum Assured in Term Insurance also remains unchanged throughout the policy period.

Term insurance is the best way to provide you the financial safety for your family or loved ones in case of your demise. It will be one of the best ways to easily safeguard the future in a better manner. The sum assured in term insurance will minimum guaranteed benefit the amount the insurer pays for the nominee in unfortunate events upon your demise. The policyholder needs to maintain the Term Insurance sum assured, which is completely equal to about 10 times the annual income.
<h3>How To Calculate Your Sum Assured?</h3>
Calculating the Sum Assured in Term Insurance is essential for buying the premiums. You can simply calculate the maximum sum assured in term insurance with the HLV or Human Life Value method. These are significant for helping to easily determine the ideal amount that is required for the financial needs of your family. It involves 2 methods for calculating the sum assured with the HLV method.

<strong>Sum Assured = Annual Income * Years Left Until Retirement</strong>

Following the Income Replacement method supports the amount required for your family to support will be covered. Sum Assured can also be calculated on a need basis. This method will be based on the monthly expenses of the family until the life expectancy of a spouse or even another dependent member. Choosing the right sum assured is most important for the Term Insurance policy. It is essential to know what is minimum sum assured in term insurance, along with the factors for knowing the optimal sum assured.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>Sum assured is useful for financially secure dependents (spouse, kids, and parents)</li>
 	<li>Sum assured should be affordable in insurance.</li>
 	<li>Age also determines the sum assured. You need to opt for a high sum assured if you are young.</li>
 	<li>Sum assured needs to be adequate for the family to pay off in the event of financial liabilities in your demise.</li>
 	<li>Sum assured is sufficient to cover all financial responsibilities like sponsoring a child’s education or marriage or others</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h2>How To Choose The Right Sum Assured Under Term Plan?</h2>
Planning for the right financial balance is quite essential for peaceful health and wellness. Many people are also quite anxious about financial security, jobs as well as other medical expenses in emergencies. Cost of availing quality medical treatments is much higher in the modern day. Shifts in the lifestyle, along with the related health conditions, are most important to consider.

Purchasing Term Insurance is one of the excellent ways to build financial safety, which is net around loved ones. The need for comprehensive <a href="https://familyraksha.com/term-insurance">Term Insurance plans</a> is higher as these guarantee a better return on investments.
Choosing the right Term Insurance plan is a must, and there is adequate coverage available. Selection of minimum sum assured in term insurance must be based on several crucial factors such as number of dependents, medical history and more.
<h3>Analyze Future Working Years:</h3>
Whether you are buying Term Insurance, it is essential to check the checklist of financial protection. Normally, the inadequate life cover is also available at a lower premium. These may or may not be sufficient for you or your loved ones. You can also pay the sum assured premium from the income. These are quite crucial for assessing the work life.
<h3>Chart Regular Annual Expenses</h3>
Buying the Term Insurance also ensures that the family gets the financial backup in case of your demise. You need to have a clear idea about what is the difference between sum assured and insured amount. It is important to know about the lifestyle expenses of you and your family members. You would be paying the premium for your chosen life cover, and it is essential to analyze the money you can afford.

It is best to take note of the monthly expenses for ascertaining the coverage amount along with the sum assured in the premium. You can see the money that you can simply set aside for the insurance needs.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>Estimate the financial coverage that you and your family needs</li>
 	<li>Keep inflation rates during estimation</li>
 	<li>Gain insight on ongoing and recurring expenses – healthcare bills, education fees, utility bills, as well as other miscellaneous expenditures.</li>
 	<li>Check whether you could pay for getting a higher sum assured with the same plan or even buy another term plan to get sufficient life cover.</li>
</ul>
</li>
 	<li><strong>Age:</strong> One of the important factors in buying Term Insurance with the sum assured is age. Normally, younger people would be getting more coverage for the lower premiums. Middle-aged people with a family can also choose the higher sum assured</li>
 	<li><strong>Assets &amp; Liabilities:</strong> The value of assets and liabilities can be considered when you are choosing the sum assured. Amount needs to be taken care of by providing the essential needs for the family in the event of your demise</li>
 	<li><strong>Income:</strong> It is also best to choose the appropriate Term Insurance while keeping in mind the working age. You can also consider the earnings per year until retirement.</li>
 	<li><strong>Lifestyle:</strong> Analyze the lifestyle &amp; expenses of your daily life so you can simply choose the appropriate plan. These help to simply take care of your family’s well-being even during the unexpected death.</li>
 	<li><strong>Consider Major Life Goals:</strong> Normally, there are certain phases in life that you need to concentrate such as higher education abroad, marriage, retirement and many more. These are essential needs for getting additional financial assistance.</li>
</ul>
Choice of sum assured based on Term Insurance can be enabled under these aspects. Various landmarks in life can also be analyzed when you prepare from a young age.
<h4><strong>Difference Between Sum Assured And Sum Assured</strong></h4>
Sum assured involves the pre-fixed amount that the nominee would receive on the death of the life insurance policyholder. The Sum insured will be the maximum amount that is received in case the event happens. Knowing about what is the difference between sum assured and sum assured on death helps to choose the right premium. The value of the sum insured will be based on the insured asset.

These depend on pre-existing diseases and medical history for medical insurance. The value of the sum assured will be based on various factors like age, liabilities, income, assets, and even working life period.

<strong>Read Also:</strong> <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/explore-term-insurance-for-housewife/">Explore Term Insurance for Housewife</a>

In conclusion, it is essential to understand the insurance terminologies with the Sum Assured. Many people also choose to buy the new term policy for easily raising total life cover with the sum assured. These can also help to keep up with the income. It will be carried within the policy tenure and you can simply choose Term Insurance for getting more benefits.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Documents Required for Term Insurance]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/documents-required-for-term-insurance/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Aug 2024 09:54:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[digital]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blog.familyraksha.com/?p=361</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Life is full of unexpected things and even unexpected events could happen anytime. Many people prefer to choose term insurance which offers better coverage at the most affordable premium. Many life insurance are available in the modern day so choosing the term insurance is a fantastic option. Knowing about the documents required for term insurance is quite essential for getting the policy approved for the premium.
<h1><strong>What Is Term Insurance?</strong></h1>
Term insurance is the purest form of protection plan. The plan provides guaranteed financial support for the family of the policyholder in the event of the death of the policyholder. For purchasing term insurance, the individual needs to submit all the documents required for a term insurance policy.

Term insurance is normally the type of Life insurance that would financially secure the loved ones in case of any uncertainties such as death. These play a major role in approving the policy.

Whether you are looking to invest in a <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance">term insurance plan</a> then you need to be aware of the documents required for term insurance policy. It is essential to keep the set of documents for buying the premium and you are required to keep them handy for the processing. Having the term insurance ensures you have financial security in the event of losing your life during the policy terms.
<h2><strong>What Are The Documents Required For Term Insurance?</strong></h2>
Term insurance policy is quite an amazing investment for those who like to secure the family's finances in case of policyholder demise. Knowing about the documents required for a term insurance plan is most important and you need to keep the document ready. Below are some of the documents required for making a hassle-free purchase.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4><strong>Proof Of Identity Document (ID) And Address:</strong></h4>
</li>
</ul>
For getting the Term Insurance policy, it is essential to submit a valid address and ID proof for the Know Your Customer (KYC) processing. These documents also are suitable for easily verifying the same.
<ul>
 	<li>Driving License</li>
 	<li>Aadhaar Card</li>
 	<li>Voters ID</li>
 	<li>Passport</li>
 	<li>Job card issued by NREGA (duly signed by an officer of the State Government)</li>
 	<li>Letter issued by National Population Register (name, address, and other details)</li>
 	<li>
<h4><strong>Age Proof:</strong></h4>
</li>
</ul>
Submitting the age proof is essential for getting the complete verification. The age group from 18 to 65 years is eligible for applying and purchasing the Term Insurance policy. It is convenient to use an Aadhaar Card or PAN card as the age proof.

Whether you are planning to buy term insurance then you need to know what documents are required for a term insurance plan. You can simply click a photo or even scan the Aadhar Card (front and back). Only the front portion will be acceptable when you are submitting the PAN card.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4><strong>Income Proof:</strong></h4>
</li>
</ul>
Normally, the income of the policyholder reflects the amount of life coverage. It also requires some of the important documents for the Term Insurance and these are suitable for validating the income. Acceptable income-proof documents are listed below
<ul>
 	<li>Income Tax Returns (ITRs) of (3 years)</li>
 	<li>Salary slips for the last 3 months</li>
 	<li>Profit and loss account and balance sheet (last 3 assessment years)</li>
 	<li>Form 16</li>
 	<li>Bank statement for salary/income (past 6 months)</li>
 	<li>Agricultural income certificate if any</li>
 	<li>Form 26 AS of last financial year</li>
</ul>
Sometimes, the life insurance provider could also ask for submitting additional income proof.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4><strong>Medical Reports:</strong></h4>
</li>
</ul>
Submitting the details about pre-existing health conditions is quite essential for buying term insurance. You will be required to fill in the details about your current health condition. Sometimes, the medical test reports are required to understand the current situation for providing life cover.

Upon submitting the medical reports to the Life Insurance provider, you would be quoted with the premium. The insurer would be listing the medical tests that the applicant is required to undergo during the process of purchasing the policy. Past medical records are also submitted when they are required.

The insurer is required to check various factors in your health risks along with the previous medical history along documents required for term insurance . These are significant options for establishing insurability. These are also helpful for finding any kind of financial risk they could undertake to offer Term insurance coverage.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4><strong>Other Mandatory Documents:</strong></h4>
</li>
</ul>
Some of the mandatory documents required for term insurance plan are
<ul>
 	<li>Recent passport size Photograph</li>
 	<li>PAN Card</li>
 	<li>Form 60</li>
</ul>
<h3><strong>Documents Required For Claiming Term Insurance:</strong></h3>
Whether you are looking to claim the Term Insurance policy then the nominee is required to submit certain documents. The nominee must fill the appropriate term plan claim for the settlements. Below is the list of documents required for term insurance claim that you need to submit to the insurance provider.
<ul>
 	<li>Original Policy Documents</li>
 	<li>Filled Claim Form</li>
 	<li>Attested Copy of Death Certificate</li>
 	<li>Photo of Nominee</li>
 	<li>Medical Reports of Policyholder</li>
 	<li>Canceled Cheque or Passbook Photocopy</li>
 	<li>NEFT mandate form</li>
 	<li>ID Proof</li>
 	<li>Post-mortem Report (if applicable)</li>
</ul>
<h4><strong>Reason To Submit Documents For Term Insurance:</strong></h4>
The documentation process for the Term Insurance policy is essential to follow with purchasing the term insurance. Documents also add value to the information that you are required to submit for the Term Insurance Company. Some of the significant of the documents for the term insurance are highlighted are
<ul>
 	<li>Updates the insurance provider about medical history and current situation</li>
 	<li>Provides surety you are an Indian resident</li>
 	<li>Provides the easy term insurance renewal process</li>
 	<li>Helps with hassle-free application</li>
 	<li>Helps with the claim process</li>
 	<li>Helps ensure a fast claim settlement ratio</li>
</ul>
Documents mentioned also serve as the evidence of information provided in the application form. It is also quite essential to what documents are required for term insurance.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Identity Proof:</strong></li>
</ul>
Documents submitted as identity proof would also reflect the gender, age, and many more. These also help to determine the premium of the Life Insurance plan.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Income Proof:</strong></li>
</ul>
Income details provide a better way for the insurers to confirm coverage for the premium. These are also helpful for availing the capacity to continue with the plan for decided tenure.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Address Proof:</strong></li>
</ul>
The Address proof documents also serve as proof of the place you reside and it is helpful to fund that you are an indian citizen. These are also helpful for the insurance company to find the risk factors associated factor with it.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Medical Proof:</strong></li>
</ul>
Insurance providers would be required to evaluate the insured’s health to easily determine about risks involved. These also help to state about the life span to the extent even without any hassle. Medical data along with other documents required for term insurance could also play a major role in the approval of the policy proposal.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Financial Documents:</strong></li>
</ul>
Financial documents such as income proof also help the insurance provider to know whether the insurance provider can afford coverage. It also helps to assure the insurance provider about approving or rejecting the premium.

<strong>Beneficiary Details:</strong>

You are also required to add the nominee details in the documents.  You are required to know what documents are required for term insurance and you can seek professionals to determine the right plan. Checking the accuracy of beneficiary information also ensures the money could go to the right person in case of your demise.

Submitting the documents required for the Term Insurance adds more benefits to getting approval for the applications. These are also helpful for getting the hassle-free and quick claim of the issuance process.

<strong>Read More</strong>:<b><a href="/zero-cost-term-insurance/">Zero Cost Term Insurаnсe</a></b>]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Adding Accidental Disability Rider Coverage]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/adding-accidental-disability-rider-coverage/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Aug 2024 09:54:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[digital]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blog.familyraksha.com/?p=365</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In everyone's life, there will be some unforgettable accidents that may happen once. But the damage is higher. To make an ideal coverage for individual riders, adding an accidental disability rider is a must.

Additional accidental disability rider coverage is the sum assured on total and permanent disability. The rider can purchase the base policy and cover certain things. Of course, total and permanent disability also includes arms or legs, one arm and leg, or both eyes. You can get <strong>income benefit on accidental disability rider</strong> when you have this coverage plan.
<h1><strong>What is an additional accidental Disability Rider?</strong></h1>
Of course, a pure term insurance for accident disability riders is to give a sum against the situation and opt for a term plan with disability rider. However, the coverage plan is applicable for disability riders, and get with your insurance plan to enhance the value. An insurance rider is additional coverage which seems to work for additional premium to get rider benefit.

An accidental disability rider plan enhances the coverage with rider options with the insurance plan. An insurance rider is additional coverage to get into an insurance plan to enhance the additional premium. The <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance">term insurance plan</a> is a must to explore the critical illness and disability rider benefits.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Includes lump sum or monthly installment </strong></li>
</ul>
The plan is extremely helpful for policyholders with a loss of income. Of course, it includes entire life, accidental total, and permanent disability rider. The choice is to develop the amount in the form to check with the policyholder. It includes lump sum or monthly installments to add unforeseen accidents. The plan is directly taken by external, violent, unforeseeable, and visible means. However, the policyholder has to make judgments in disability to permanent from the date of the accident.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Basic life insurance coverage </strong></li>
</ul>
The cause of disability may happen in unforeseen situations. Of course, it is solely and directly by external or unfortunate accidents. Moreover, the accidental term insurance for disability riders takes place immediately. The disability rider policy includes satisfaction and benefits with the amount.

A term insurance with accidental disability rider includes basic life insurance and provides a loved one with financial support. However, it includes situations to use and adapt to provide financial support. A term insurance plan is always delivering disability to provide financial support to additional benefits.
<h2><strong>Importance of Purchasing Accidental Disability Rider</strong></h2>
Of course, an accidental disability rider can be useful for adding to the term insurance policy. However, it includes the best-enhanced coverage and provides financial protection. The term insurance should be explored with accidental total and permanent disability riders.

It includes some reasons and finds out the rider has an addition to the term insurance policy. The best way is to enhance coverage and financial protection for accidental total and permanent disability riders.
<ol>
 	<li><strong> Financial Protection: </strong></li>
</ol>
Accidental total and permanent disability provide financial protection to handle difficult circumstances to handle disability during an accident. The life assured shall be received with the sum assured and have total and permanent disability.

The rider sum assured have to find out life assured and get urgent treatment for his/her disability. In case of life assured to make a living financial aid helps the life assured and members to maintain a decent lifestyle.

On the other hand, accidental disability riders may be different from making a living for themselves without any hassles. Thus, it will help you find out life assured and members to maintain a decent lifestyle. In case of life assured, to make a disability caused in the accident.
<ol start="2">
 	<li><strong> Tax Benefits: </strong></li>
</ol>
Of course, the tax benefits in the term plan with accidental disability rider with sections 80C and 10D of the Income Tax Act 1961. However, the life can avail up to Rs. 1.5 lakh for the premium over term insurance policy for riders. In addition to this, the accidental disability rider has control over with total and permanent disability rider. The double tax exemptions under 80D of the Income Tax Act with a  proper outcome for the policyholder.
<ol start="3">
 	<li><strong> Multiple Payout Options: </strong></li>
</ol>
On the other hand, the life assured gets the chance to hold a payout option with a lump sum or regular installation. It is provided with a lump sum to the policyholder without any hassles. Hence, the life-assured total and permanent disability rider takes them to live and earn from the policies.
<ol start="4">
 	<li><strong> Income Replacement: </strong></li>
</ol>
The regular installment and payout under this rider have to be controlled with numerous benefits. It takes a complete solution by noticing under-income or regular sources of income. Thus, it should be life assured and life itself with options. The income replacement has to be controlled with life assured one and monthly turnover will be on average.

However, the life assured policy will change with daily expenses and help their family to a decent lifestyle. Hence, the rider can ensure income for life in case to earn a living due to the disabled options. In addition to this, the policy tenure and disability is to decent lifestyle forever.
<ol start="5">
 	<li><strong>Affordable:</strong></li>
</ol>
As a policyholder, it includes total and permanent disability riders to provide coverage at an affordable price. However, it includes a premium for this rider has to control over with quite expensive. You can get extensive coverage that holds with a basic price and affordable premium costs for your accidental disability rider.
<h3><strong>Term policy is active </strong></h3>
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Critical Illness Rider</strong></li>
</ul>
In addition to what is accidental disability rider query? The term insurance must provide the lump sum amount to handle critical illness. However, it should be an active one and handle financial benefits from the rider. It covers the medical bills and the best medical care is valuable in handling difficult times. The illness takes an average role by policy to the active rider for your desires.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Accidental Disability Rider</strong></li>
</ul>
Accidental disability rider insurance provides financial support to handle leads to total and permanent disability. With a specific period from accident, it provides plan benefits and handles policy nominees in case of death and policyholders. The received amount must be compensated for loss of income in setting up the accidental disability or death. The death of the policyholder must handle total and permanent disability rider options.

<strong>Documents Required for Accidental Total and Permanent Disability Rider Claim</strong>

Of course, you have to submit the required documents for accidental total and permanent disability riders. Nominees and policyholders have to submit necessary documents during the process.
<ul>
 	<li>Filled Claim Form</li>
 	<li>Original Policy Documents</li>
 	<li>Policyholder's Photo ID Proof, Address Proof</li>
 	<li>Policyholder’s Bank Account Details</li>
 	<li>Original or Copy of FIR</li>
 	<li>Original or Copy of Police Inquest Report</li>
 	<li>Original or Copy of Postmortem Report</li>
 	<li>Sub-Divisional Magistrate’s Final Verdict</li>
 	<li>Driver’s License of the life assured</li>
 	<li>Accidental Total and Permanent Disability Benefit Rider Exclusion</li>
 	<li>Some of the exclusions under Accidental Total and Permanent Disability Benefit Rider include:</li>
 	<li>Suicide</li>
 	<li>Self-inflicted Injuries</li>
 	<li>Drug overdose or alcohol abuse</li>
 	<li>Disability occurring after 180 days of the accident</li>
 	<li>Participation in civil commotion, riots, war, or rebellion activities</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;

An accidental disability rider with term insurance seems the best option and ensures financial support. However, if it lets you meet with an accident or is diagnosed with a critical illness, the income benefit on accidental disability rider is there for you. Of course, it can be easy and handle huge financial support to family and they lose a regular income source. They can face mounting hospital bills and other debts accordingly.]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Explore Different Type of Term Insurance Plan]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/explore-different-type-of-term-insurance-plan/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Aug 2024 09:54:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[digital]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blog.familyraksha.com/?p=381</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Everyone must get the term insurance as there may be some unfortunate situations happen. Of course, the main reason to pick the term insurance is to protect financially for your dear one after your demise. It is very important to get the term insurance to protect your family in the future. The plan options are reasonable and suitable for your budget as well. With changing times and needs, a single plan is not suitable at all. So, you have to know the types of term insurance to make your life protective.

On the other hand, you have to know the importance and types of term insurance in detail. However, the terms level and decreasing refer to the death benefits and get amount after the death. A lump sum will be given to the nominee with some benefits. If death occurs at certain points, the nominee will get the policy amount as well. Before applying for term insurance, you must notice the types of term insurance in detail.
<h1>What is a Term Insurance Plan?</h1>
A <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance">term insurance policy</a> is an agreement to live insured and the insurance provider must gain significant benefits. However, it should be admiring one to handle ultimate demise and specific sum. The death benefits will paid with the insured person nominee by the insurance company. They are always applicable to notice about coverage on the policy ends with it. It must be noted with the ultimate one and pay with life-insured demise party one.

The policyholder does not get money back even with outliving the term plan. However, the types of term insurance plans mature the overall solutions and explore life insurance. Premium plans are to execute with the amount back and return it to Immerse Solutions. In other words, the policyholders should be essential in noticing about tenure with premium amount back.
<h2>Different Types of Term Insurance Policies</h2>
Term insurance plans are always the best ones and are more affordable. Everyone has to get a salaried employee or a business person has to work with insurance policies. They are always recommended to get high coverage and lower premiums. So, the term insurance types are evaluated based on the families and coverage against liability and financial uncertainties.

On the other hand, the term plans are always excellent and enable proper coverage. It is completely responsible for showing potential guidance. The term insurance plans are always unique and notice first approach one. As a result, the term insurance might work with policies to govern finance and family protection.

These are the types of term insurance policies that are available at premium rates. Based on the sum assured, it is completely working with maturity benefits to the policyholders. With proper term plans, they are assured to work with term plans with effective goals
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h3><strong>Level-Term Insurance Plans: </strong></h3>
Level-term insurance plans are the best one for a policyholder who pays fixed insurance. They are always adaptive on basic terms to explore with term insurance plans. It is also known as the level premium term plan for guaranteeing fixed death benefits. However, it can even work with policyholder requirements. They ensure a proper outcome and the plan must be referred to with definition. Thus, level plans are the general cost-effective variant for you. Your investment is significantly good as it conveys death benefits to the nominee during the policy tenure.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Increasing Term Insurance</h3>
Under <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/increasing-term-insurance/">Increase term insurance</a> policy, the sum assured person can choose to increase a specified amount or percentage. However, the type term plan is always applicable to design with inflation and changing circumstances. It completely works with sum assured in checking out policy makers and stays the same overall policy tenure. It is supposed to simple rate or compounded rate for percentage increments. On the other hand, the enhanced term insurance must be reliable and taken with percentage increments. You can get types of term insurance to convey the maximum limit to the increment in the sum assured. They completely depend on the enhanced limit reaching over with policy tenure continues. It will set out with enhanced term plans to gain sum-assured results.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Decreasing Term Insurance</h3>
As the name suggests, decreasing term insurance is nothing but where the sum assured amount will decrease by a percentage every year. However, the opposite of enhancing term insurance is getting death benefits as get reduced each year. The premium sum will get into the policy tenures that are assured with choice. You have to choose the decrease every year with a policy tenure achieved. The premium will stay the same without any hassles.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Term Insurance With Return Of Premium</h3>
Term insurance with ROP works the same way as a normal term plan among the different types of term insurance. Of course, the policyholder will get two lies in the maturity payout with a high TROP. Under the term plans, the insured will get a return of premium at the end of the policy tenure. It will survive the term policies with return payments at all the premiums they paid during the tenure.
If the policyholder passes during the tenure, their nominee gets dual benefits payout of the death and ROP payment. The ROP payout is completely maturity benefits and includes tax exemption. They assure to work with insured chance and sum assured term will get into the maximum premiums within the period. With additional benefits, they overcome disabilities, accidental death benefits, and protection against critical illnesses.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Convertible Term Insurance</h3>
Of course, convertible term insurance plans allow the insured to change as per the term policy norms and conditions. They can get into a life or universal policy with a health qualification process again. It will assure you focus on a <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance-limited-pay-vs-regular-pay/">regular term plan</a> but with added features of conversion. This type of term insurance must set out to cover individual life benefits. The term insurance might apply if the insured continues to pay for insurance premiums with overall plans and results.

The policyholders who purchase the term plan over 30 years might survive with their plan. They are likely to exhibit maximum life types of term insurance policies. They will assure you to work with a convertible term plan with an average role. So, it must be easy and no endowment plan must include benefits. They will match up with the <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/what-is-sum-assured-term-insurance/">sum assured Term Insurance</a> and noted with term insurance policies commonly available in the Indian market.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h2>Benefits of Term Insurance</h2>
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Affordable Premium</strong>
Of course, term insurance plans are the most important one to protect your dear one after your demise. With a good premium rate, the affordable premium rate is a must-have to apply for a large-term plan. They can apply for a plan online with sum assured solution with a more affordable premium rate. So, you can know how many types of term insurance eligible to apply and get benefits.</li>
 	<li><strong>Ease of Buying</strong>
On the other hand, the term insurance might work with an easy buying option. However, they can digitalize their process and offer life insurance with limited coverage. You can easily purchase the term insurance policies from the providers. It allows the candidate to compare their term plans and CSRs to terms.</li>
 	<li><strong>Flexible-Premium Payments</strong>
The benefits of applying the term insurance are to provide flexible premium payment modes. They take a complete solution and choose the best insurance policies as per your budget. However, you have to avail yourself of different flexible premium plans with online payment. They can set out a new solution to protect your dear one after the demise.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Conclusion</h4>
Finally, you must know about the types of term insurance to make specific payments for the dear one in the future. Of course, term insurance policies are good because of their budget-friendly plans. They completely depend on the requirements and include lots of benefits in leading a peaceful life.

Also, your dear one will get a lump sum after the demise to manage the financial expenses. With premium options, you can get the enhanced sum assured to 5 years and an enhanced cover option. You must have steady income benefits, spouse cover, limited premium pay option along tax benefits.
<h2>FAQs:</h2>
<h3><strong>Which is the most common type of term life insurance policy?</strong></h3>
Mostly, people prefer level-term insurance policies because of their affordability and fixed sum. Of course, it will assure you to work with a guarantee and pay with a premium rate with a fixed term plan with ROP another popular option.
<h3>How many term insurance plans can I purchase?</h3>
You can surely buy more than one term insurance plan. Of course, it allows you to follow the terms and conditions to adapt to the plan every year. Most commonly, the term plans are always the best ones and economical as well with limited rates.
<h3>Which type of term insurance plan provides increasing death benefits?</h3>
Enhanced term insurance plans are always offering higher death benefits to the sum assured. With a percentage each year, it will opt for a term plan to ensure with return of premium benefits. It also offers a dual payout with maturity and death benefits.
<h3>Can the term insurance cover be increased?</h3>
Your term insurance is a must one with proper coverage, but at the same time offers add-ons to the premium one. The enhanced term policy base coverage is a must and expensive to opt for brand brand-new policy.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[what is term insurance in India]]></title>
		<link>https://dev.familyraksha.com/what-is-term-insurance-in-india/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Aug 2024 09:54:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[digital]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://blog.familyraksha.com/?p=390</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In the modern day, many Indians have limited awareness about the benefits of life insurance policies. When you love your family and care about their future, then you need to safeguard the financial safety of them in your absence. You need to know ‘what is term insurance’ before purchasing them for the benefits of your family. Term Insurance is the ultimate instrument for ensuring that your family does not lack the financial resources.

<strong>Term insurance</strong> involves a Life Insurance premium that offers better financial coverage for the policyholder. Normally, these are set for a limited period of time. For instance, in the event of the death of the policyholder, the premium coverage could be helpful for the family.

Premium coverage is paid to the nominee of the policyholder in the event of the death of the policyholder during the policy term. It is essential to know ‘what is term insurance policy’ along with many key features before buying them. It is a better way to opt for the term insurance policy based on the premium rates.
<h2>Purpose of Taking Life Insurance:</h2>
Main purpose of buying the term insurance plan is to provide life coverage for the policyholder as well as financial security for the family. Normally, there are many numbers of ways you can simply take Life Insurance coverage.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Term insurance</strong> – Pure life coverage policy</li>
 	<li><strong>Endowment insurance</strong> – Life cover with the savings component added</li>
</ul>
<h3>Why Term Insurance Is Beneficial?</h3>
The term Insurance plan offers complete life coverage, and it does not involve any profit or saving components. Term plans are especially the basic plan for making the coverage more affordable. Normally, the policyholder could easily opt for the large file coverage even at the lower premiums. These are much more effective when compared to other endowment plan. Know what is term insurance and how does it work as it helps to make the right decision about purchasing the coverage.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Provides Add-Ons: </strong>Upon buying the term insurance, you can also add riders along with the policy. These riders are suitable for easily extending your policy benefits. You are required to pay the additional premium to get comprehensive coverage.</li>
 	<li><strong>Cover Against Eventualities:</strong>Are you looking to secure your loved ones during the financial crisis in your absence? Having Term Insurance is a great way to take significant coverage even for the lower premium rate.</li>
 	<li><strong>Better Cover For Critical Illnesses:</strong>Some people between the ages of 30 and 40 think that they do not require an insurance plan for their health. You would never know that you could be suffering from a severe illness like kidney failure, cancer, and many others. It is better to know what is term insurance in India and purchase the right package for your future. These are helpful for your loved ones if their health deteriorates.</li>
 	<li><strong>Secure Assets:</strong>Many people have taken loans such as education loans, vehicle loans, personal loans, and home loans. Repayments of the loans could be financially weighing you down for the family in the event of your demise. Having the Term Insurance plan is the best way to proceed and pay off the loans in your absence.</li>
 	<li><strong>Financial Security For The Family:</strong>Are you the primary earner in your family? Buying the term insurance plan is a great option for your family to take care of monthly financial requirements in your absence.</li>
</ul>
<h2>What Are The Types Of Term Insurance?</h2>
In the modern day, there are many types of Term Insurance available. The level of the term policies also varies from one company to the other. It is important to find what is <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance">term insurance plan in India</a> along with the benefits. Main reason is that each policy has Pros and Cons for the beneficiaries as well as the policyholders.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Increasing Term:</h4>
Some Term Insurance policy allows for an increase in death benefits for nominees. Normally, the premium increases but allows the policyholder to pay lower premiums. Increasing the term would also prevent qualifying another policy as you are old.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Convertible Term:</h4>
Convertible Term Life Insurance is suitable for those who like to buy term insurance for a limited number of years. When the time expires, the policy will be converted into universal Life Insurance or even whole life Insurance. Biggest advantage of this convertible insurance for the policyholder is getting lifelong coverage.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Mortgage Term: (Decreasing Term):</h4>
The Mortgage Term involves the death benefit amount decreasing with time. The main goal of this method is to match the decline of term benefits with reducing the outstanding mortgage of the policyholder.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Annual Renewable:</h4>
Annual Renewable are types of term insurance that can be easily renewed. Main advantage of this annual renewable-based term insurance is the coverage. These are guaranteed to be approved every year, even without any hassle. You need to know what is term insurance and life insurance as both of them have differences in features.</li>
</ul>
<h3>What Is The Minimum Eligibility For Term Insurance?</h3>
Normally, the minimum age limit for Term Insurance is 18 years old. It is essential to become eligible for buying the term insurance plan. Whether you are buying term insurance at a young age, then, you can get massive coverage by saving money on premiums.
<h2>FAQ Question</h2>
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h3>What is The Term Insurance Meaning?</h3>
Term Insurance is the most amazing pure life insurance policy that offers added protection for the policyholders. These provide better coverage of the insurance for a certain period of time. The insurer would provide a guaranteed sum of money in the event of any unfortunate event under the policy. These are helpful for providing compensation for the nominee in the event of demise.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>What Is Term Insurance, And How Does It Work?</h3>
The Term Insurance is widely preferred by many people for its pure life insurance product. These offer better financial protection for the family holder or nominee of the policyholder. These also provide large cover even for a specific period of time with the fixed premium amount. Normally, the policyholder pays the premium for coverage. In the event of the demise of the policyholder, the nominee would get the sum of the premium.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>What Is An Example Of Term Insurance?</h3>
Term insurance can be easily understood with the example. Johnny buys a Term Insurance plan and becomes a policyholder. He is paying about Rs 500 per month as the premium for the <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/best-1-crore-term-insurance-plan-in-india/">Rs 1 crore term plans</a>. Johnny has placed his son David as a nominee for the term insurance plan. In the event of the death of Johnny during the policy term, then the insurer would be paying the sum of Rs 1 crore to David.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Which Is Better, Term or Life Insurance?</h3>
Comparing the term and Life Insurance plan is quite difficult as this varies with the terms and other features. It is essential to understand the difference between them before applying. Whether you are looking for life cover with the lowest premium, then you can choose a Term Insurance plan. Whether you are in need of a savings plan with massive benefits, then you can choose a Life Insurance plan.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Is It Good To Take Term Insurance?</h3>
Of course, you can purchase the Term Insurance plan to ensure your family gets better returns in the event of your demise. Term Insurance especially provides a large sum of coverage in the policy. These are available at the most affordable premium. There are also many numbers of Add-ons available, which bring more benefits. Term Insurance is an excellent option for saving your money on the monthly premiums.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>What Is The Difference Between Term Insurance And Life Insurance?</h3>
Normally, the Term Insurance plan provides death benefits in the event of the demise of the policyholder. The Nominee would be getting the coverage amount. A life insurance plan involves providing the maturity benefit and death benefit for life assured. It is a better option for understanding the Life Insurance plan and term insurance plan before purchasing the plan. The term insurance plan offers more life coverage at the most affordable premium.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>Why Should You Buy Term Insurance In India?</h3>
Many people prefer to buy Term Insurance in India because of its affordable price range. It helps to easily save more money in the process when compared to buying Term Insurance from companies abroad. There is also <a href="https://www.familyraksha.com/term-insurance-for-nri/">term insurance for the NRI</a>, which is 50% cheaper when compared to abroad. Are you looking to buy a term insurance plan? You can easily buy term insurance in India to get more benefits.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>What Are The Minimum And Maximum Age Limits To Buy A Term Insurance Plan?</h3>
The term Insurance plan also involves minimum and maximum eligibility. These could vary from one insurance company to another. Some of the common eligibility criteria for the age limit are listed below. The minimum age limit is 18 years old, and the maximum age limit is based on the insurer. You need to know about the minimum and maximum age limits for the Term Insurance plan with seeking your insurer.</li>
 	<li>
<h3>What Are The Factors That Affect The Term Insurance Premium Rates?</h3>
Some of the factors that could affect the Term Insurance premium rate are age, amount of insurance coverage, yearly income, and more. Apart from these, health conditions and lifestyle habits such as smoking/non-smoker also play an important role in setting the premium rate for the term insurance. Availing of the term insurance policy by following these attributes is quite essential.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>
